title: Teacher Professional Development: Internship-Based Simulation/VR Practical Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Professional development program for pre-service and in-service teachers, providing practical opportunities through VR-replicated classroom environments

learning_goals: Participants can implement lesson improvement plans applying reflective thinking in a VR simulation environment with over 80% proficiency.
Participants evaluate communication counseling and classroom management skills by applying at least three case-specific strategies through internship scenarios.
Participants improve their self-efficacy by over 20% after using VR-based curriculum design tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
